CheckTitle: Ensure SafeLinks for Office Apps is enabled and configured correctly.
Description: Ensure that SafeLinks for Office Apps is enabled and all recommended settings are configured in each SafeLinks policy.
Risk: If SafeLinks for Office Apps is not properly configured, users may be exposed to malicious links in Office documents, increasing the risk of phishing and malware attacks.

Code.Other: 1. Go to Microsoft 365 Defender (https://security.microsoft.com). 2. Expand Email & collaboration > Policies & rules > Threat policies. 3. Under Policies, select Safe Links. 4. Edit each policy and ensure all recommended settings are enabled as described.

Recommendation.Text: Enable and properly configure SafeLinks for Office Apps and related settings in all SafeLinks policies.

Notes: This check validates that all recommended SafeLinks settings are enabled for Office Apps.
